document_data.caption: A map showing Eru in north Halruaa.
document_data.name: Eru
document_data.mainbody: '''Eru''' was a small town located in the nation of [[Halruaa]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|B2aNEIc}}
document_data.Geography: Eru was located in northern Halruaa. The town lay along the western banks of the [[River Aluar]] where it was joined by the [[High Aluar]] flowing southeast from the nearby [[Nathaghal Mountains]].
